import React, { Component } from 'react'; import ReactQuill from "react-quill"; import 'react-quill/dist/quill.snow.css'; class Review extends Component { state = { title: '', game: '', platform: '', score: null, text: '', blog: false, review: true, walkthrough: false } constructor(props) { super(props) this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) } handleChange(value) { this.setState({ text: value }) } handleInput(value) { this.setState({ name: value }) } render() { return (
); } } export default Review;
